sentences.sentence: The fold in the chain is completed using only 3 or 4 monomer units with bonds in the gauche conformation.
sentences.translation: 链中的折叠仅使用3或4个具有 gauche 构象键的单体单元完成。

sentences.sentence: Decreasing the amount of crosslinking monomer in the synthes ins of the thickener will improve the anti fiushing property of the products.
sentences.translation: 减少增稠剂合成物中的交联单体的量将改善产品的抗起泡性能。

sentences.sentence: The trimer also breaks down into the toxic monomer form.
sentences.translation: 三聚体也能分解成有毒的单体形式。
